markdownRemark.html:
Since my last post, I was fortunate enough to complete an internship at LinkedIn, get a return offer, and graduate from Georgia Tech. That pretty much sums it up, along with great memories along the way. But suffice to say the least, it’s been one wild ride, from COVID-19 impacting the economy, to graduating virtually from one of the top technical institutes in the nation.

As much as I didn’t like the assignments and all-nighters I had to pull for assignments and exams, I’m starting to feel a bit of Stockholm Syndrome creep into my system. I feel as if now, I have entered a completely new stage in life. To be frank, I’m unsure of where my priorities lie yet, but I thought
